docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 16--Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay are negotiating for the cooperative operation of their navies to protect the neutrality of the entire east coast of South America. Details have not yet been completed but it is understood that the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 16--Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay are negotiating for the cooperative operation of their navies to protect the neutrality of the entire east coast of South America. Details have not yet been completed but it is understood that the eventual objective is the coordinated collaboration of the military, naval and air forces of the three republics.
docs.abstract: Argentina, Uruguay and Brazil negotiate for cooperative neutrality defense; joint coast patrol planned

headline.main: PLAN JOINT PATROL OF SOUTH AMERICA; Argentina, Uruguay and Brazil Negotiating for Cooperative Defense of Neutrality UNITED NAVY FIRST STEP Military and Air Forces to Be Next--Prevention of Refueling for Submarines an Objective

docs.snippet: More than 1,000 musicologists, practicing musicians and government officials are enrolled in the membership of Americanismo Musical, a movement to support contemporary composition and music study in the countries of South America, Francisco Curt...
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 1,000 musicologists, practicing musicians and government officials are enrolled in the membership of Americanismo Musical, a movement to support contemporary composition and music study in the countries of South America, Francisco Curt Lange of Uruguay asserted in his address at the final session of the International Congress of the American Musicological Society yesterday morning at the Beethoven Association.

headline.main: MUSIC AID RAGED FOR LATIN AMERICA; Musicological Congress Told of New Movement to Support Contemporary Compositions 1,000 LEADERS ENROLLED Copyright Legislation Sought to Protect Composers of Southern Countries

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 16--The outbreak of the war in Europe has destroyed the great trade structure which Germany had built throughout Latin America upon the artificial foundation of medieval barter and other bilateral arrangements.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 17 (AP)-- South America's three Atlantic seaboard nations, Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay, established today a coordinated naval patrol of their territorial waters to safeguard their neutrality in the European war.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 17 (AP)-- South America's three Atlantic seaboard nations, Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay, established today a coordinated naval patrol of their territorial waters to safeguard their neutrality in the European war.
